ACTION_SELECTLANG_BEFORE_SCAN_DESCRIPTIO: Before scanning your code, we'll need to know what programming language it's written in.
ACTION_SELECTLANG_BEFORE_PROJECT_DESCRIP: What programming language will you use to build your project?
ACTION_SET_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Choose a username to be known as when creating and sharing your projects. This name is not unique to you and can be changed later.
ERROR_BAD_SCAN: We couldn't scan your code, please try again with a clearer picture or better handwriting.
ERROR_NO_PROJECTS: No projects found, create your first one using the button below.
ERROR_NO_CONNECTION_TO_HUB: We couldn't connect to the project hub. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
ERROR_REACT_NEEDSMAIN: To run a React app, you must declare a Main() function.
SECTION_PROJECT_HUB_DESCRIPTION: Discover a variety of community-made projects and curated samples.
SECTION_SANDBOX_DESCRIPTION: Sandbox mode allows you to quickly scan and run code without saving it.
